channel.title: Tools on KhanhIceTea B(rain)-log
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on KhanhIceTea B(rain)-log

item.title: #TIL 2017-09-25 : Zip compressing list of files
item.description: Zip compressing list of files To specify a list of compressed files when using zip cli tool, you could use -@ [file_list] flag. And file_list is a file contains list of compressed file (new line separated) Example $ zip changed.zip -@ changed_files.txt Or use stdin pipe $ find . -mmin -60 -print | zip changed_1_hour_ago -@ This will zip all changed files 1 hour ago

item.title: #TIL 2017-04-21 : Base 64 encode and decode builtin tool
item.description: Base 64 encode and decode builtin tool Browsers have helpers function to encode and decode base64 : btoa : base64 encode atob : base64 decode > btoa('Hello world') "SGVsbG8gV29ybGQgIQ==" > atob('SW4gR29kIFdlIFRydXN0ICE=') "In God We Trust !"
